subcategory.name: Vertical Navigation
subcategory.description: Vertical navigation list examples for Tailwind CSS, designed and built by the creators of the framework.
subcategory.introduction: Use these Tailwind CSS vertical navigation components to create menus that fit perfectly into your application's sidebar, featuring section headings, badges, and icon links. These navigation components are designed and built by the Tailwind CSS team, and include a variety of different styles and layouts.
